author: Scott Polacek
title: 2020 U.S. Open at Winged Foot Reportedly Postponed Because of Coronavirus
description: The U.S. Open reportedly will not take place as scheduled from June 18-21.       Mark Cannizzaro    of the  New York Post  reported the major will be postponed until later in the ...
content:
Drew Hallowell/Getty Images
The U.S. Open reportedly will not take place as scheduled from June 18-21.
Mark Cannizzaro of the New York Post reported the major will be postponed until later in the summer because of the coronavirus pandemic but will still tak… [+1404 chars]
